productShortDesc: Remove makeup and impurities with our bestselling cleansing oil. This minimalist formulation is fragrance free and suitable for even the most sensitive skin typologies. Dermatologically tested. 99% naturally derived. Vegan. Made in France.
productIngredients:
Sweet almond oil:
nourishes and improves the elasticity of the skin. It also has soothing properties to calm skin and reduce tightness.
 Sunflower seed oil:
rich in antioxidants this oil protects the skin against free radicals while nourishing and cleansing the skin.
Caprylic/Capric triglyceride:
derived from coconut, this ingredient facilitates makeup removal and leaves skin feeling soft.
 Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate:
an emulsifier derived from coconut that allows the product to rinse off easily.
 Isopropyl isostearate:
derived from rapeseed, this ingredient facilitates the removal of makeup particles.
 Vitamin E:
an antioxidant to preserve the oils in this formula and prevent them from turning rancid over time.
 Sunflower seed hybrid oil:
used as a solvent, this seed oil nourishes the skin and facilitates makeup removal.
